requirements.description: Mixpanel's tracking and use of information about the Customer on Mixpanel Sites are governed by the Mixpanel Privacy Statement.
The Mixpanel Privacy Statement is available at https://mixpanel.com/legal/privacy-policy/.
The Mixpanel Privacy Statement does not cover information Mixpanel processes on behalf of the Customer for Application Services.
It is the Customer's responsibility to provide their own privacy statement or notice to their End Users.
The Customer must provide all required disclosures and obtain all necessary consents from their employees and/or agents.
Mixpanel may collect registration and other information about the Customer as Mixpanel's customer through Mixpanel Sites.
